data.comment: The match is underway at Gazprom Arena.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 10, In Saint Petersburg, Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 11, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Saint Petersburg.
Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg Sochi attack through Elmir Nabiullin. The finish is off target, however.
Sergei Ivanov awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Sardar Azmoun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
Viacheslav Karavaev is on target to give Saint Petersburg a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 17, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Sochi to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 19, Yaroslav Rakitskiy is back on his feet again.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Saint Petersburg, Christian Noboa of Sochi is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Sochi's area.
Goal kick for Sochi at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 23, Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Emanuel Mammana for Sochi has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 24, It's now 2-0 in Saint Petersburg as Aleksandr Yerokhin scores for Saint Petersburg.
Daler Kuzyaev with an assist there.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
In the minute 26, Sochi needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg's Daniil Krugovoy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sochi defender.
In the minute 28, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 33, Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Saint Petersburg) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
In Saint Petersburg Sochi drive forward through Christian Noboa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 36, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 41, Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Aleksandr Yerokhin's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sochi at Gazprom Arena.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Saint Petersburg's Aleksandr Yerokhin misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergei Ivanov awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 45, Saint Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sergei Ivanov blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 46, Sergey Semak is making the team's first substitution at Gazprom Arena with Andrey Mostovoy replacing Daniil Krugovoy.
Kirill Zaika is on a sub for Elmir Nabiullin for Sochi.
The away team replace Nikita Burmistrov with Ivan Miladinovic.
In the minute 48, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Andrey Mostovoy for Saint Petersburg is whistled offside.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Sardar Azmoun of Saint Petersburg is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Sochi at Gazprom Arena.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 57, Sochi are back in the match in Saint Petersburg. Kirill Zaika has scored to make it 2-1.
Artur Yusupov instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Ivan Miladinovic (Sochi) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 65, Joaozinho of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint Petersburg make their second substitution with Wendel replacing Aleksandr Yerokhin.
In the minute 66, Artem Dzyuba is replacing Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Sochi's Timofey Margasov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 68, Sergei Ivanov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Magomed Ozdoev is replacing Wilmar Barrios for the home team.
Artem Dzyuba's header is off-target for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 71, Sergei Ivanov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Sochi.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
At Gazprom Arena, Kirill Zaika has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 75, Sergey Terekhov's header is off-target for Sochi.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Sergei Ivanov waits before resuming play because Sergey Terekhov for Sochi is still down.
In the minute 76, Sergey Terekhov is back on the pitch.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Sochi throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Christian Noboa is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Sochi at Gazprom Arena.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a third substitution, with Marko Dugandzic replacing Anton Zabolotnyi.
The away team has substituted Christian Noboa with Ibrahim Tsallagov. Vladimir Fedotov is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 79, Aleksey Sutormin is replacing Sebastian Driussi for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 82, Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team have replaced Joaozinho with Danyl Prutsev. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
Viacheslav Karavaev for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Sochi push forward at Gazprom Arena and Marko Dugandzic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
Sergey Terekhov for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 86, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Sochi are coming forward and Artur Yusupov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sergei Ivanov will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Zaika for Sochi is back on the field again.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Attention is being given to Sochi’s Kirill Zaika and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal! Douglas Santos extends Saint Petersburg's lead to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Aleksey Sutormin.
Artur Yusupov (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
